title: Sci-Fi And Fantasy Recommendations For Your Summer Reading
description: If you want to dip a toe in the starry seas of fantasy and science fiction, but you just don't know where to start, Pop Culture Happy Hour is teaming up with Life Kit for a handy beginner's guide. What's the difference between sci-fi and fantasy? Is there one at all? We'll cover all that and throw in some reading recommendations to get you going.

itunes:summary: Want to start reading science fiction and fantasy? We've got you covered with the genre basics and some solid recommendations.
